description:
LDS Music is the official hymns and music app of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. It serves as both a digital hymnal and music player, with sheet music and audio from the Hymnbook, Children’s Songbook, and other collections.

If you have any questions or feedback about the app, you can open the app, go to Settings, and tap Send Feedback. You can find additional information about the app on the LDSTech wiki at https://tech.lds.org/wiki/LDS_Music_for_iOS.
artistName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
releaseNotes:
Improved and expanded content:

• Added the Hymnbook in German, Korean, Italian, Russian, Ukrainian, Finnish, Latvian, and Traditional Chinese
• Added the Children’s Songbook in German and Traditional Chinese
• Corrected typos in existing English, Spanish, French, and Portuguese music
• Marked verses below the music in words view
• Added singing instructions to words view

Better use of storage:

• Turned off downloading music in the background by default
• Use smaller audio files for faster downloads and less storage
• Added the ability to manage storage in the new Settings tab

Stability and UI changes:

• Added support for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
• Simplified the change language screen
• Combined the Authors and Composers tabs into the new People tab
• Revised song sharing to support share extensions
• Removed Google+ sharing (we expect the Google+ app to provide a share extension soon)
• Fixed various crashes and UI issues
sellerName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
